plays.text: Penalty to Vitaly Vishnevski 2 minutes for High Sticking Radim Vrbata
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Milan Hejduk and Derek Morris
Penalty to Bryan Muir 2 minutes for Hooking Andy McDonald
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Rob Blake and Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Jason Krog assisted by Paul Kariya and Niclas Havelid
Penalty to Niclas Havelid 2 minutes for Hooking Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Jason Krog assisted by Dan Bylsma and Alexei Smirnov
Penalty to Kurt Sauer 2 minutes for Tripping Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Ruslan Salei 2 minutes for Boarding Steve Reinprecht
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Peter Forsberg and Joe Sakic
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Tripping Dan Bylsma
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Steve Rucchin and Adam Oates
Penalty to Paul Kariya 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Matt Cullen 2 minutes for Tripping Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Matt Cullen
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Adam Oates and Paul Kariya
Goal scored by Keith Carney unassisted
